DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety intravenous itraconazole compare amphotericin B HIV positive negative person blastomycosis histoplasmosis .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Open , Comparative Multicenter Study Initial Treatment With Intravenous Itraconazole Versus Amphotericin B Followed Consolidation Treatment With Itraconazole Capsules Patients With Blastomycosis Histoplasmosis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize receive IV itraconazole 2 day , either itraconazole daily 5 day amphotericin B daily 7 day . IV treatment follow consolidation oral itraconazole 1 year .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV positive negative status . Blastomycosis histoplasmosis . Life expectancy least 1 week . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Liver disease . Selflimiting fungal disease . Very severe fungal disease meningeal involvement . Acute respiratory disease . Concurrent Medication : Excluded time : Terfenadine . Astemizole . Oral midazolam . Triazolam . Cisapride . Phenytoin . Phenobarbital . Rifampin . Rifabutin . Excluded oral consolidation : H2 blocker . Chronic antacid . Omeprazole . Lansoprazole . Patients follow prior condition exclude : Hypersensitivity azole antifungal . Prior Medication : Excluded time : More 3 day amphotericin B , fluconazole , ketoconazole . Excluded within 2 week prior study entry : Phenytoin . Phenobarbital . Rifampin . Rifabutin .
